title: Bifrost
description: Being sent on a year-long covert mission to discover what happened to a ship that mysteriously went silent after returning from the other side of the galaxy was bound to put a strain on Oedipa Maat and Joe Casta's relationship. But even locating and reaching the missing vessel amid corporate intrigue and terrorist attacks could prove to be dangerous. Yet what they find on the ship could prove to be far more deadly and amazing than they could ever imagine.
author: Dan R. Arman
